results.title: Industrial Designer (m/f)
results.description: In the role of the Industrial Designer, you will be responsible for the Industrial Design of Harman’s branded car audio solutions. You will be creating, developing and managing the design evolution of multiple Harman premium brands, including harman/kardon, JBL, Infinity, Lexicon, mark levinson, Revel, AKG and licensed business such as Bowers & Wilkins, CANTON, CLASSE, Bang & Olufsen and B&O PLAY. In collaboration with our engineering- and marketing-team you will envision and design holistic ca…
